pullrequest.title: Plotting Palette: Topics and Sim tabs

content.raw: Just one minor issue with tooltips. It doesn't seem to update its position if you move to another item with the same type or to a non-leaf item. Other than that, works great. This can be addressed later in the next pull request.
content.html: Just one minor issue with tooltips. It doesn't seem to update its position if you move to another item with the same type or to a non-leaf item. Other than that, works great. This can be addressed later in the next pull request.
